LOOSE Women fans were horrified on Tuesday when Paris Fury said she would be "pleased" if her dog died. 
The 30-year-old appeared on the programme as they discussed pet bereavement, telling panellis… [+3148 chars]

articles.title: How France's Lupin became the surprise Netflix hit of the season - The Guardian
articles.description: The charming series combines Ocean’s Eleven’s slickness with the implausibility of National Treasure to become the first French series to crack the US top 10
articles.content: The greatest trick by Lupin, a new French series on Netflix, is disguising substantiveness in plain sight. The show, created by the British showrunner George Kay and inspired by the beloved French ch… [+5374 chars]

articles.title: Kate Middleton Queen Consort: How Kate's role to change when Prince William is king - Express
articles.description: KATE, DUCHESS OF CAMBRIDGE is married to heir to the throne Prince William but her royal role will dramatically change when he becomes king.
